text:
="preserve">Adrien Gouteyron (13 May 1933 – 26 August 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the Senate of France between 1978 to 2011. He represented the Haute-Loire department. He was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement Party. Gouteyron was born in Rosières, France.
Gouteyron died on 26 August 2020 at the age of 87.
